beer.name: Nutty Brewnette
beer.description: A unique American-style brown ale. A blend of four different dark malts produces a flavor profile that is sweet with ""nutty"" notes. A healthy dose of hops makes this beer hoppier and more balanced than most English brown ales.
beer.grains: 2-row pale, english crystal, briess victory and special roast, chocolate
2-row pale, english crystal, briess victory and special roast, chocolate
